items.name: Alpha Wolf Vestige

items.description: Antelope Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create an Antelope Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary.

items.name: Arctic Arm Armor
items.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade to Fur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

items.name: Arctic Feet Armor
items.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade to Fur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

items.name: Arctic Head Armor
items.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade to Fur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

items.name: Arctic Vesper Vestige
items.description: Arctic Vesper Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create a Arctic Vesper Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary. The trophy can serve as a decoration providing Coziness.

items.name: Arid Striker Vestige
items.description: Arid Striker Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create an Arid Striker Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary.

items.name: Armor Attachment Pack
items.description: Armor Attachment Pack is a Tier 3 Techneeded for the Alteration Benchthat allows Prospectors to alter their armor pieces with Attachment Packs.

items.name: Armored Saddle
items.description: The Armored Saddle is a saddle for Mountsthat has a medieval aesthetic. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Ashen Drake Vestige
items.description: Ashen Drake Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create an Ashen Drake Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary.

items.name: Bear Vestige
items.description: Bear Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create a Bear Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary. They are also used at the Advanced Textiles Bench/Electric Textiles Benchto make Bear Rugs. Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of the Well Rested Buff.

items.name: Black Jaguar Vestige
items.description: Black Jaguar Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create a Black Jaguar Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary.

items.name: Blueback Vestige
items.description: Blueback Vestiges are used at the Trophy Benchto create a Blueback Trophy, which can help prospectors complete the Bestiary.

items.name: Bone Arm Armor
items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as a Tier 1 armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.name: Bone Feet Armor
items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as a Tier 1 armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.name: Bone Head Armor
items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as a Tier 1 armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as a Tier 1 armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.name: Brown Bear Arm Armor
items.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade to Bone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with the Calibrated Grip Attachments and Attack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.

items.name: Brown Bear Feet Armor
items.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade to Bone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with the Calibrated Grip Attachments and Attack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.

Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of the Well Rested Buff.

items.name: Carcass Harvesting Attachment
items.description: Carcass Harvesting Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked the Tool Attachment Packtech.

items.name: Cloth Arms Armor
items.description: Cloth Armor, while not being very protective in a fight, provides relatively good protection from the heat in deserts. It also makes traveling slightly quicker.

items.name: Composite Arms Armor
items.description: Composite Arms Armor is the highest tier of crafted armor in Icarus and thus provides superior protection from wildlife, while providing considerable insulation from the elements.

items.name: Exotic Harvester
items.description: The Exotic Harvester is used to extract Volatile Raw Exoticsfrom Volatile Raw Exotic deposits. Requires 1,500 k Wh to operate.

items.name: First Cohort Envirosuit
items.description: As part of the ICARUS: Supporters Edition (unavailable for purchase), prospectors received an exclusive UDA envirosuit with a built-in water slot – giving an edge to prospectors who dare pursue fortune on the moon's surface. There’s no better way to show your commitment than to wear it with pride. The First Cohort Envirosuit is researched and crafted in the Workshopon the Space Station.

items.name: Fur Arms Armor
items.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade to Leather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

items.name: Fur Feet Armor
items.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade to Leather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

items.name: Heavy Obsidian Arm Armor
items.description: Heavy Obsidian Armor is a Tier 2 armor specialized in heat resistance with a slightly higher physical resistance than Leather Armorand a major boost in armor durability, great for taking on what the volcanic regions of Prometheus have to offer.

items.name: Heavy Obsidian Feet Armor
items.description: Heavy Obsidian Armor is a Tier 2 armor specialized in heat resistance with a slightly higher physical resistance than Leather Armorand a major boost in armor durability, great for taking on what the volcanic regions of Prometheus have to offer.

items.name: Hunter Arms Armor
items.description: An upgrade to Ghillie Armorwith over double the physical/exposure resistance and an increase to crouch movement speed when a full set is worn. The ideal armor for hunting that will give any prospector the advantage over wild game.

items.name: Hunter Feet Armor
items.description: An upgrade to Ghillie Armorwith over double the physical/exposure resistance and an increase to crouch movement speed when a full set is worn. The ideal armor for hunting that will give any prospector the advantage over wild game.

items.name: LM Beastmaster Arm Armor
items.description: The LM Beastmaster Arm Armor is part of the LM Beastmaster Armor Set, which can be unlocked in the Workshopon the Space Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs to Mountsand tamed creatures.

items.name: Larkwell "Bulwark" Envirosuit
items.description: The Larkwell "Bulwark" Envirosuit offers more resistance to cold/hot environments with the added bonus of exposure resistance, making it a decent upgrade to the Shengong 'Bihu' Envirosuitand the Shengong 'Dongtian' Envirosuit. Requires Red Exotics.

items.name: Larkwell "Haulier" Envirosuit
items.description: Despite the Larkwell "Haulier" Envirosuit not having a water slot, Prospectors adore this Envirosuit for its larger inventory size and mod-ability. Requires Red Exotics.

items.name: Sandworm Arms Armor
items.description: Sandworm Arms Armor is made from the scales dropped from a Sandworm. Provides exceptional heat protection with the added bonus of poison resistance when worn with a full set of Sandworm Armor.

items.name: Sandworm Feet Armor
items.description: Sandworm Feet Armor is made from the scales dropped from a Sandworm. Provides exceptional heat protection with the added bonus of poison resistance when worn with a full set of Sandworm Armor.

items.name: Scorpion Arms Armor
items.description: Scorpion Arms Armor is a Tier 2 crafted armor requiring a Textiles Bench; however, it is difficult to acquire due to the challenge of defeating Husk: Exterminationand requiring Scorpion Carapace. It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

items.description: Seed Harvesting Attachment is a mid game item for attaching to a Harvesting Cartthat allows collection of Seedswhile harvesting crops planted in Dirt Moundsor Crop Plots. It has no effect on plants found in the wild.

items.name: Suit Conditioning Module
items.description: This module increases the user's resistance to cold/hot environments, reducing the chances of Hypothermia/Hyperthermia. It can be researched and crafted on the Space Stationin the Workshop. Multiple Suit Conditioning Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase the users cold/heat resistance.
